item.title: Season 4 | Episode 1: Mental Algorithms of Physicists | The Copernican Mental Algorithm
item.itunes:title: Season 4 | Episode 1: Mental Algorithms of Physicists | The Copernican Mental Algorithm
item.description:
In this short episode, we explore the importance of the Non-Specialness Mental Algorithm, also known as the Copernican Mental Algorithm.

This idea challenges the assumption that humans occupy a privileged or special position in the universe. Instead, it reveals how scientific thinking gradually removed humanity from the center of existence, shaping the modern scientific worldview.
